Test Name: Miscellaneous UF Health Pathology Laboratory Tests
Specimen Type: Varies by test (e.g., blood, urine, tissue, etc.)
Purpose: To ensure accurate, consistent, and timely analytical results for clinical decision-making across multiple laboratory sections.
Container: Appropriate specimen container per test protocol (e.g., VACUTAINER tubes, sterile containers, formalin jars, etc.)
Equipment: Section-specific laboratory instruments (e.g., chemistry analyzers, hematology analyzers, microbiology incubators, immunology platforms, histology processors)
